players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I don't think Bob is innocent, I think he killed Charlie."
Bob: "I am the mafioso and I killed Charlie last night. Alice, you should reconsider your accusation."
Diana: "Bob, you're lying. Alice, I think we should investigate Bob further and see if there's any evidence to support your accusation."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice

players.name: Diana
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Alice: "I don't think Bob is innocent, I think he killed Charlie."
